ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8.8 ounce) package halloumi cheese, cut into 8 slices
1 large lemon, juiced, or more to taste

cookingTips: Heat olive oil until it shimmers before adding halloumi slices
Fry 2-3 minutes per side until a golden crust forms
Serve immediately with a squeeze of fresh lemon juice
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach me the quick technique for pan-frying halloumi saganaki to achieve a golden crust while keeping the center creamy.
